Thrive

A hardcore bullet hell game with RPG elements.

Available onitch.io

Fight Enemies

Fight common enemies as you journey through a procedurally generated world of circles.

Enter Dungeons

Bosses on the overworld will occasionally drop portals to visit themed dungeons.

Win Boss Fights

Beating a boss inside of a dungeon wins unique loot.

Helpful UI

Instructions, an inventory, and your statistics are all easily viewable at the click of a key.
